overview:
As Chief Product Officer at Nero, Martin Stein manages the product and marketing departments and drives the vision and direction for Nero’s Products.

Prior to joining Nero, he served as VP of Products and Services at Extensis. Under Martin’s direction, the company successfully pioneered and released a cloud-based digital media management platform for fonts and an SaaS solution for photos and videos.

At Quark, Martin drove the product vision for a scalable, real-time media management solution, which hundreds of media enterprises such as Time Inc use to manage their production processes. Martin previously held Media Publishing and Business Development positions at IDG and Apple.

Martin holds a Master’s degree in Social Science with a focus on empirical research from the Technical University Stuttgart, Germany.
